name: Lagomorph Reversal
description:
Resist the robots trying to take over your carrot farms!

WASD to move.

Left mouse to shoot a bunny from the bunny bazooka. 

Baby bunnies can grow up to a bunny with a bazooka by eating carrots grown in your farm.

Right mouse to command your bunny army. (Baby bunnies jump to attack, and grown up bunnies shoot to the indicated direction)
